DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter double-blind randomize controlled trial . A total 420 anovulatory Chinese woman PCOS recruit , randomization stratify participate site . Participants randomize one two treatment arm : letrozole CHMG letrozole CHMG placebo . CHMG placebo take twice day six month . Letrozole ( 2.5 mg daily ) give day 3-7 menstrual cycle spontaneous period withdrawal bleeding , dose increase 5.0 mg daily last three month non-pregnant woman groups.The aim present study determine efficacy combine treatment letrozole CHMG improve live birth rate infertile Chinese woman PCOS . Our hypothesis combination letrozole CHMG likely increase ovulation rate decrease miscarriage rate result higher live birth rate PCOS woman letrozole alone .
DOC.brief_title: Letrozole Versus Chinese Herbal Medicine Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Chinese woman PCOS . PCOS must diagnose base presence two follow three Rotterdam criterion : ( 1 ) oligomenorrhea , anovulation ; ( 2 ) hyperandrogenism ; ( 3 ) observation polycystic ovary sonography . Oligomenorrhea define intermenstrual interval > 35 day < 8 menstrual bleeding past year . Amenorrhea define intermenstrual interval > 90 day . 2 . History least one year infertility . 3 . Age 20 40 year old . 4 . Normal semen analysis base World Health Organization criterion ( 2010 ) . The husband need sign consent form semen analysis part clinical assessment site . A sperm concentration ≥15 × 106/mL total motility ≥40 % semen analysis husband require woman include . 5 . Normal uterine cavity least one tube patent upon hysterosalpingography HyCoSy . Exclusion criteria 1 . History significant system diseases heart , lung , kidney disease . 2 . History endocrine disorder . 3 . Use hormonal therapy , include metformin , past 3 month . 4 . Previous sterilization procedure ( vasectomy tubal ligation ) reverse .
